sentences.en: I don't deny that your sister comes the mogul over us, now and then.
sentences.cn: 我并不否认,你姐姐老是象个暴君似的骑在我们头上.

sentences.en: I stood up to greet the 35 - year - old mogul and cheap plastic crackled beneath my feet.
sentences.cn: 我起身迎接这位35 岁 的高尔夫巨子,脚下的廉价塑料窸窣作响.

sentences.en: Pre Jumping: Prejumping the face of the mogul pumping with heavy contact on the backside.
sentences.cn: 提前跳: 提前从包脸跳起后重重的落到包背上.

sentences.en: Punch: The tips of the skis should push powerfully down the backside of each mogul.
sentences.cn: 冲击: 雪板的头部要有力的向下推向每个包的背部.

sentences.en: Spot Fixation: Looking at one spot in a mogul line and loosing the flow of motion.
sentences.cn: 视点固定: 视线固定在雪包线上的某一点而导致动作不稳定.

sentences.en: The football captain was the mogul of the school.
sentences.cn: 那足球队长是该校的大人物.

sentences.en: The lifestyle of the mogul is an attractive one, but not for investors in their businesses.
sentences.cn: 大亨的生活方式非常诱人, 但不是对其业务的投资者而言.

sentences.en: The press mogul befriended the high and mighty in Britain.
sentences.cn: 这位报界大亨和英国的显贵达人们交情甚好。

sentences.en: The reason is that her boyfriend, Milton Chiu, is the son of entertainment mogul Chiu Fu - sheng!
sentences.cn: 原因就出在男友Milton, 是影视大亨邱复生的儿子!

trans.tran_cn: 有权势的人，大人物，〈美〉富豪，贵族，小〉富豪，贵族坡，雪坡，蒙兀儿人
trans.tran_en: A mogul is an important, rich, and powerful businessman, especially one in the news, film, or television industry
